alert.note: Alert for Delta; Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Delta, Lamar and east central Fannin Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking several strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sumner to near Crockett Lake. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris, Honey Grove, Blossom, Roxton, Lake Crook, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Crockett Lake, Pattonville, Camp Maxey, Pat Mayse Lake, Powderly, Forest Hill, Pecan Gap, Toco, Sun Valley, Glory, Petty, Globe, and Brookston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
